document_data.name: ''Pipe of Smoke Monsters''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''pipe of smoke monsters''''' was a [[magic]]al [[pipe]] whose smoke could be shaped into the form of a creature.
document_data.Powers: The user of a ''pipe of smoke monsters'' could concentrate while exhaling to shape the smoke into the likeness of any creature, such as a [[dragon]], a [[flumph]], or a [[froghemoth]]. The shape occupied a volume no larger than a cube 1 foot (30 centimeters) on a side for a few seconds, then dissipated.
document_data.History: ''Pipes of smoke monsters'' were relative common magic items that could be found in various locations, such as [[Undermountain]].
